title: A Tank shouldnt be able to outdamage a champion made for damage!
body:
{{champion:57}}  {{champion:78}} 

These two need to be nerfed YESTERDAY!

replies.body:
They don't.
They deal enough damage to kill squishies who can't kill them back.

Squishy champs deal more damage, but tanks typically have like 3k HP and 100+ in each defense.

Squishies have like 1.5k HP at most and sub 50 resistances.

They are made of paper.
Maokais early game damage is INSANE!
Maokai has high mana cost that is easily misused. And poppy can be abused by range easily
45 mana on a 250 dmg skill is NOT high
It is when you are forced to use it to waveclear.
Yea so is dravens but you dint see us yelling nerf

Lol at this comment. Ignorance is bliss:

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/P9Ux9EJK-draven

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/LEKLAVd5-draven-71

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/4NE5YAsq-good-idea-buffing-draven

I saw this one thing. On the boards. That said if you right click a poppy it dies like instantly.
Seriously dude

When Draven makes a misstep, he gets blown up. 
When Maokai makes a misstep, he most likely still wins the early game trade.
Wow congrats do you finally realize that some people are better early game, deal with it
Tanks have high base damage but poor scaling. They hurt early as it helps them with laning and jungle, but damage wise they fall off late.
They don't out damage they out live ADCs

they don't lol

Tanks only kill ADCs because ADCs have no resists and they die to a light breeze before they have lifesteal and pen

Tanks lose to every DPS champion that's the slightest bit durable
Base damage is the problem. Nerf their base damage and they'll be ok.

Nerf their base damage and they might as well farm under tower or be supports. 

Sorry, I know that people can reasonably nerf base damage, but it's high for a reason.

and if the roles were reversed, where damage dealers could solo tanks, I could say "damage dealers shouldn't be able to tank more than tank champions!"

do you see the flaw yet? Tank still do damage, squishies can't take a lot of damage. 

The situation is: little damage vs. little health which produces the same result as tons of damage vs. little health because the end result is still death

Honestly tanks aren't out of line in any role right now. Take a look at the winrates, ban rates, and play rates.

Mao is probably the strongest. Poppy and CoC got nerfed and  she is weaker than before.

They are fine.
Good thing they mathematically don't then.

Lol, dude. They won't nerf Maokai... they will probably buff him.

Then need to justify giving him victorious skin last year. ;)
